title: Serge Ibaka
summary: Serge Jonas Ibaka Ngobila[1] (/ˈsɜːrdʒ iːˈbækə/;[2] born 18 September 1989)[3][4] is a Congolese-Spanish professional basketball player for the Los Angeles Clippers of the National Basketball Association (NBA). Ibaka was drafted by the  Seattle SuperSonics with the 24th overall pick in the 2008 NBA draft. Ibaka is a three-time NBA All-Defensive First Team selection and has twice led the league in blocks. Although born in the Republic of the Congo, Ibaka plays for the Spain national team. In 2019, he won his first NBA championship as a member of the Toronto Raptors.
